select-ingredient: Select an ingredient to add. Be aware that the quality, price, and edibility of your choice will affect everyone's opinion of you!
Lewis: Look sharp! The governor's here for his annual visit.#$b#If you brought something for the potluck make sure and add it to the soup cauldron. Remember, quality, cost, and edibility may affect the taste of the soup!
Config.EveryoneMustContribute.Desc: Disable to not require every player to add an item to receive ingredient results
